statement.tex: \text{Find the integral of the function}\\ \tan ^4 x

step.context: \text{Are the following calculations and analysis correct?}
\text{Is the following evaluation of the integral}\\ \int \sec^2 x \tan^2 x \, dx - \tan x + x + C_1 \quad \text{correct}?
step.reason: \int x^n dx = \dfrac{x^{n+1}}{n+1} + C \\ \text{ where C is the constant of integration.}
